name: Cyberpunk '97 - Episode 1 Demo
description:
Take your first steps in a dystopian future the likes of which you've seen in countless pieces of media before!  Influenced by such titles as Shadowrun, Blade Runner, Johnny Mnemonic, Syndicate, and more!

Play as a character of your choice as you try to get by in this cruel world.  Uncover your past as you decide whether to move past it or not.  Cross the blurred lines of modern morality as you do whatever you can to gain an advantage; be it not reporting a murder so you can search their apartment for loot or learning how to hack Corporate accounts for your own benefit!  Or!  You could just get a job and not worry about all that intrigue stuff!

Please note this is an early demo version; this demo comprises maybe 15% of the total gameplay for Episode 1.
